action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a market scene with two women. One woman is standing behind a table filled with various vegetables, including leafy greens and potatoes. She is wearing a purple top and a red apron. The other woman, wearing a pink jacket and blue jeans, is walking past the table. There are bunches of bananas hanging above the table, and boxes of produce are stacked below. The background includes more produce and market items.
